name: Lunooom
0:
”Alexa, ask my luno discover devices”
”Alexa, ask my luno”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my luno
Developer Terms of Use
des:
To control your Lunooom Smart table using Amazon Alexa, you need to first enable the Lunooom skill and link your Lunooom account. Once you've done that, you can use the following commands to control your devices:

Getting Started
 To verify the Lunooom skill is connected, you can use the following commands:
 “Alexa, ask My Luno”
 “Alexa, open My Luno”

Discover Devices
 To find and discover your Lunooom devices
 “Alexa, ask My Luno Discover Devices”
 “Alexa, ask My Luno Find My Devices”

Control Lights
 Here are the commands to control the lights on your Lunooom Smart table named "earth":
 
 Turn On Lights:
 “Alexa, ask My Luno earth turn on lights”
 
 Turn Off Lights:
 “Alexa, ask My Luno earth turn off lights”

Change Light Color:
 “Alexa, ask My Luno earth change lights color Orange”
 “Alexa, ask My Luno earth set lights color Orange”

Play Light Theme:
 “Alexa, ask My Luno earth play lights theme Rainbow”

Play Design Tracks :
 “Alexa, ask My Luno earth start design Full Triangle”
 “Alexa, ask My Luno earth start Full Triangle”
 “Alexa, ask My Luno earth play design Full Triangle”
 “Alexa, ask My Luno earth play Full Triangle”

Design Tracks Action :
 “Alexa, ask My Luno earth pause design”
 “Alexa, ask My Luno earth resume design”

Example Usage
 Turning on the lights on your Lunooom Smart table named "earth":
 “Alexa, ask My Luno earth turn on lights”
 Changing the light color to orange:
 “Alexa, ask My Luno earth change lights color Orange”
 Playing a light theme called "Rainbow": 
 “Alexa, ask My Luno earth play lights theme Rainbow”

Note
Make sure to replace "earth" with the actual name of your device if you have multiple devices with different names.
Full Triangle is design track name.

By using these commands, you can effortlessly control your Lunooom Smart table and enjoy the perfect blend of art, tradition, and technology in your home.
